programme.title: Day 6 Highlights | Winter Youth Olympic Games 2020
programme.desc: The 6th day brought Alpine Skiing, Biathlon, Figure Skating and the 3-on-3 Mixed Teams Ice Hockey events to a close. Who would claim the final medals of these competitions? That and more for you to enjoy within our daily highlights.

programme.title: Deva Handball Club
programme.desc: Team Sweden Olympic hero Thomas Sivertsson travels to Great Britain to try to turn around the fortunes of a struggling handball team.
